ISSUE.TITLE: Admin should not able to submit apply as vendor form
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Login with admin Go to **Apply for vendor account** from footer link Fill form and submit. **This allows admin to submit a form and it map admin to with newly created vendor.** But admin can't be assigned with any vendor, So admin should not able to submit **Apply for vendor account** form ------------------------ Let's display the following error after submitting this form by an administrator - "Store administrators cannot apply for vendor accounts"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4403 Added hiding "Pickup Fee" if all items in the cart are free shipping
